title: KHR_texture_transform glTF TextureInfo Extension
description: glTF extension that enables shifting and scaling UV coordinates on a per-texture basis

offset.description: The offset of the UV coordinate origin as a factor of the texture dimensions.

rotation.description: Rotate the UVs by this many radians counter-clockwise around the origin.

scale.description: The scale factor applied to the components of the UV coordinates.

texCoord.description: Overrides the textureInfo texCoord value if supplied, and if this extension is supported.
